Articles.Content:
My first submission to the forums. Sorry for the cruddy image quality. Sent up in three pieces and assembled in orbit, capable of a round trip to Duna fairly easily. Turns like a brick, though. Front end is the nuclear tug to drag the thing to Duna, middle section is fuel storage for the tug, final section is the lander with a second asparagus-staged nuclear thruster for the return trip.

Edited November 19, 2014 by Azu942
Better screenshots
If you want to upload images, go to imgur.com

Key F1 screen captures the game to a "screenshot" folder in the game directory, then set up a imgur acct, simple and easy, so you can display pictures like year 2014, not 1995.

Otherwise looks good, Holy part count, as usual.
Aside from the pic quality (which doesn't really matter,) this looks fantastic! A great first post! BTW, Welcome to the Forums!
Thanks for the replies, and the warm welcome.
